laserTag.tagline: Portable and highly immersive laser tag for Japanese events.

concept.title: Concept
concept.description: Delta Quest is a portable and highly immersive laser tag experience that can be integrated into all kinds of large-scale events in Japan, such as e-sports tournaments, stadium events, and anime/game conventions. We offer an unprecedented 'real game' experience through VR and IP collaborations.

list.portable: Portable setup: Adapts flexibly to any event location.
list.ipCollaboration: Brand experience through IP collaboration: Interacts with the fan base by partnering with anime and games.
list.competitive: Competitive and family-friendly: The game features a scoring system, team matches, and can be enjoyed by parents and children alike.

targetEvents.title: Target Events
targetEvents.description: Ideal for e-sports tournaments, sports events, anime/game conventions, and many other large-scale events. It's the perfect attraction for organizers who want to increase visitor engagement.
